name: close to you
description:
short horror game about waiting for the inevitable.

you are seeking shelter from the apocalypse in an abandoned diner. you are safe in here, but also trapped.

no jumpscares

CW: rapidly flickering lights and potential motion sickness.

---

made during 1 week for an "isolation" themed horror game jam! first time ever making a horror game, who-hoo! (sorry about the ladder climbing mechanic. i know. trust me, i know.)

i tried to get a webGL build going, but i think the game's a bit too big for that :') only download, sorry! hope you still give it a go. <3

also, i unfortunately wasn't able to test the mac build, so please let me know if you encounter any issues!

hope you enjoy uwu

---

lyrics of "(they long to be) close to you" written by hal david and burt bacharach.
